frontmatter.title: Angular Forms: Template Driven approach
frontmatter.excerpt: Template Driven is the most common way to manage forms in Angular when you start to dive into this framework. Although It offers fewer features than the Reactive approximation, sometimes It could be very useful. Mainly for forms which don’t manage huge information.
